author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Mini Topped Rye Breads recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rye bread,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free
name: Mini Topped Rye Breads Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 slices thin slices rye bread or pumpernickel

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the rye bread into small squares  about 6 squares per slice, depending on how big the slices are.
Top each bread square with a fine slice of Dolcelatte cheese, a teaspoonful of diced beetroot, and a tiny amount of creamed horseradish. Arrange on platters, and serve.
